com.ac.games.rest.controller

Class CSIDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ac.games.rest.controller.CSIDataController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/external/csidata")
public class CSIDataController
extends Object
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the CoolStuffInc game information.

    It should handle all request that come in under the /external/csidata entry.

    Refer to the individual methods to determine the parameter lists.

    Author:
    ac010168

    • Method Detail

      • getCSIData

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object getCSIData(@RequestParam(value="csiid",defaultValue="-1")
                               long csiID,
                               @RequestParam(value="source",defaultValue="csi")
                               String source,
                               @RequestParam(value="sync",defaultValue="n")
                               String sync,
                               @RequestParam(value="review",defaultValue="null")
                               String review)
        GET method designed to handle retrieving the CoolStuffInc content from the coolstuffinc website and return the formatted CoolStuffIncPriceData object.

        This method supports the following parameters:

        • csiid=<gameid> - The gameID. This is required.
        • source=<csi|db> - This indicated whether to request the game from BoardGameGeek (bgg) or from our cached database (db). Default is csi.
        Parameters:
        csiID -
        Returns:
        A CoolStuffIncPriceData object or SimpleErrorData message reporting the failure

      • putCSIData

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object putCSIData(@RequestParam(value="csiid")
                               long csiID,
                               @RequestParam(value="review",defaultValue="null")
                               String review,
                               @RequestParam(value="gameid",defaultValue="-1")
                               long gameID,
                               @RequestBody
                               com.ac.games.data.CoolStuffIncPriceData data)
        PUT Method, which should update (or potentially upsert) the provided data object.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        A SimpleMessageData or SimpleErrorData message indicating the operation status
